tool.name: Biomedical NER
tool.description: identifies bio-medical named entities in the input text.
tool.help:
HELP ====
Required Annotations --------------------
None
Generated Annotations ---------------------
1. Protein 2. DNA 3. RNA 4. CellLine 5. CellType
